import "./styles/CreditCard.css" function CreditCard({ cardData, isFlipped, focusedField }) { return (
{cardData.number || "•••• •••• •••• ••••"}
Titulaire
{cardData.name || "NOM DU TITULAIRE"}
Expire
{cardData.expiry || "MM/AA"}
CVC
{cardData.cvc || "•••"}
) } export default CreditCard
